d51pearpkg2.name: CakePHP_CodeSniffer
d51pearpkg2.description: PHP_CodeSniffer rules for checking code against the CakePHP coding standards.
d51pearpkg2.changelog: * Bump to 1.0.0 as development has already started on a PSR-2 compatible codesniffer that will be released at the 2.x version number.
* Stick with 1.x version of PHP_CodeSniffer.
* Stick with 1.x version of PHP_CodeSniffer.
* Closure spacing sniff was added. * Improved API doc blocks. * Fix reference operator sniff for reference values in arrays.

* New Type casting sniff added. * New function comment sniff added. * Improved error messages for use statements. * API doc block issues raise warnings. * API doc block indentation issues are now a warning instead of an error.
* Documentation sniffs are no longer applied to test cases.
* Docblocks now allow only 1 space after variable types. * The `{@inheritDoc}` tag no longer triggers errors.
* Fix broken PEAR package.
* New FunctionCommentSniff added. * Added composer.json * Restructured repo to work better with composer.
* The `__debugInfo` magic method in PHP5.6 is not flagged as an error anymore.
* Operator sniff no longer fails on negative numbers inside short arrays.
* Namespace/directory sniff was removed. CakePHP will be using PSR-4 autoloading which no longer follows this rule.

* Useless method override sniff was removed. It created many false positives and rarely provided any valuable feedback. * Using underscored property names no longer triggers errors. The new ORM in 3.0 will have widespread use of underscored properties, we cannot treat them as errors.
* Protected properties on traits no longer trigger warnings.
* Remove doubly reported errors for function names. * Methods with the same name as the class no longer trigger warnings.
* Fix `use` sniff to not flag closures, and correctly handle classes defined after a closure.
* Fix constant sniff to not flag renamed trait methods.
* Fix use sniff for closures.

* Windows newlines no longer cause violations. * PHP 5.4 short <?= variant is now allowed. * tmp directories are now excluded. * Alternative syntax control structure sniffs were improved. * Whitespace before/after commas is now checked. * Underscored method names are now allowed in Task classes. * Inline control structure sniffs were improved. * `use` statements alphabetical ordering sniff improved. * Fix detection of class opening brackets. * Call spacing checks for built-in methods was improved. * Only the .git directory should be ignored. * Blank lines are now required after `namespace` and `use` keywords. * Private static variable names no longer cause violations.
* Fix issues with parenthesis on include/require statements.

* Use sniff for traits/namespaces now works correctly. * Sniffs for blank lines after namespaces added. * .git should not be checked, but paths containing it should. * Make tests simpler to setup/run. * Add sniff for class brace placement.

* Use Generic.WhiteSpace.DisallowSpaceIndent instead of ForceTabIndentSniff * Adding sniff for space and tab mixing * Fixing operator spacing issue * Added sniff for require use in alphabetical order * Remove outputstring from error message, failing test will already show why the assert failed * Fix error messages for tests * Fixes for PHP 5.2 * Add travis support

* Supporting namespaces using block format * Validating trait names * Checking use in alphabetical order more properly and supporting traits * Fixed code standard issues * Implemented sniff to validate @throws in PHPDoc with support to namespaces * Fixed use alphabetical order to check per file. * Added sniff for require use in alphabetical order * Added validation for one class per use * Added validation for namespaces * Changed to test files recursively. * Fixed call for the fail on test case
* Small bug fix for operator spacing sniff. * Test suite improvements.
* Small bug fix for variable name sniff.

* Remove contains numbers rule. * Fix naming rules on Schema classes. * Ignore .ini.php files. * Remove commented out code sniff. * Remove inline control structure sniff, as they are useful in HTML files.
* Fix doc comment indent message. * Fix operator spacing rules when used with case & ternary operators. * Fix method checking on shell classes. * Added space indent rules. * Added unit tests.
* Fix issues with scope indent rules. * Fix method checking on shell classes.
* Fix dependency issues.
* Fix private variable sniffs. * Add phpcs dependency.
